title: Inexpensive and Minimal Equipment Games To Spend Time On
discription: I've always been interested in being frugal and wanted a repository of fun and inexpensive games to play by yourself and with others.

title: Simple + Minimal Exercise Routine
discription: A simple, minimal and modular exercise routine I developed that can be done anywhere, focusing mainly on short and simple circuits.

title: Day planner based on location
discription: A lateral-thinking way to encourage you into desired activities.

title: I just found out about Zettelkasten
discription: Zettelkasten makes all of your notes easier to develop, utilize, and organize for whatever you need them

title: Keyboard Remapping on OSX - Adding the Missing Insert Key
discription: Keyboard Remapping on OSX - Adding the Missing Insert Key for using Trackers And/Or Other Old DOS Programs (Reality Adlib Tracker, MilkyTracker, etc.)

title: Buying Things "Just In Case" vs. Real Estate
discription: Does buying a thing just in case I need it in the future outweigh the costs? Putting extreme situations aside, I pretty much always feel the answer is no.

title: The Adam Savage Trial Method
discription: When you're starting a hobby, don't buy the expensive tools. Buy something mid-range. If you use it so much that it breaks, buy the best one to replace it.
